Rattrap/BA/OP/Rhinox?SB
 
the five of them all reach the battle site at the smae time
 
Rattrap "Rodimus who do you want us to take down" 

Yojinbo of Nightmare <bustercross365@...> wrote:Splattercannon/ Malice/ Injustice/ Wolfblade:

Splattercannon growled a little and opened fire with his body mounted 
beam cannons.  NO one was going to stop him, not this Predacon 
anyway.  

Malice and Injustice followed Blacknightmare's lead and they bounded 
on to the cannon and began slashing it with the claws and tail blades.

Wolfblade looked to the cannon to see it under attack.
"Rodimus!  They're starting to trash the cannon!"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Hdyras/BlackNightmare/Perceptor/:
> 
> 
> Hydras looked at Splattercannon and opened fire against him.
> 
> While Blacknightmare landed and looked the cannon, decided to won 
> this fight as quickly as possible she opened fire against the cannon
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Yojinbo of Nightmare" 
> <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> > Malice/ Injustice/ Megatron Revived/ Splattercannon:
> > 
> > Malice and Injustice let out a whoop and both dropped  down into 
> the 
> > fray.  The Hunter Killer and clone scrambled over to the cannon 
> site 
> > where they both stood tall and shouted to the cannon's guardians.
> > "Alright Maximals, the day of Reckoning has arrived!" Malice 
> shouted, 
> > he and Injustice getting ready to jump the first bots who came 
> after 
> > them.
> > 
> > The Emperor clone scoffed.  This Hydras was a pompus moron.  But 
> for 
> > now they were allies.  Megatron returned to dismantling Sweeps, 
> > slicing them with his sword or blasting them in the face with his 
> > head vulcans.  He was strafed suddenly, looking up he saw a 
> gunship 
> > bearing down on Hydras and him.  He brought his cannon up and 
> > prepared to fire.
> > "It's over!" he said, before firing.
> > The cannon fired a 35% blast, it shook the ground as Megatron 
> > recoiled.  Splattercannon evaded the blast, but lost control and 
> > crashed.  He transformed and started looking for his first victim.
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > BlackNigmare/Darkfate/Nightstrike
> > > 
> > > "Agree"said the femme while she flew towards the place and said 
> by 
> > > comlink (And just for minions)"REmember that we have to destroy 
> > that 
> > > cannon... After that erase those maximals"
> > > 
> > > Nightstrike nodded and follow her, but DarkFate didn't say 
> anything 
> > > and flew towards the spot where A bunch of Maximals, triped and 
> > > preds were.
> > > 
> > > Hydras:
> > > 
> > > Hydras destroiyed a bunch of sweeps and said with a tone 
> > > carasteriztical of his old Megagron side "Don't press your 
luck!"
